language_not_yet_requested: You haven't requested the language ``{lang}`` yet, {mention}!
all_languages_removed: All languages you have requested were removed, {mention}.
create_lang_role_already_existing: The role ``{role}`` does already exist on this server, {mention}!
language_unregistered: The language ``{lang}`` was successfully removed from BeTheProfessional, {mention}.
no_permission: You have not enough permissions to do that, {mention}!
bot_no_permission: I have not enough permissions to do that, {mention}
private_channel: There are no roles in private chats!
help_sent: The help was sent to your private chat, {mention}

description.+: Adds a language (multiple languages at once: ``;``)
description.*: Adds a language to the bot (only for admins)
description./: Removes a language from the bot (only for admins)
description.delLangRanks: Removes all roles created by the bot (for admins)
